name: Block & Load
description:
Block & Load

Keep your friends close, and your enemies closer. Block & Load is a 3D infinite runner game where you use your enemies as the path. You play as a skilled ruin raider, who is caught in the middle of her most recent predicament. You can shoot your enemies with your bow to turn them into blocks, push them around to create paths, or just climb right over the top of them, see how long you can last!

-CONTROLS-

(played with controller)

Left Analog Stick - Move

Right Analog Stick - Aim 

Left Trigger - Target/Lock on to enemies (right analog to change target)

Right Trigger - Shoot

Hold B while walking into a block to push it

Run up against blocks to climb over them
